title: Skincare is Important!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Maki-chan, is your face a little red today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Oh, is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, could that be a sunburn? What’d you do for Golden Week?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>For Golden Week… I spent every day getting dragged around by Rin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Oh, okay, sounds like you had a fun Golden Week then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That isn’t what I said at all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, yeah. Anyway, it isn’t good to just leave a sunburn alone. Use twice as much lotion as usual today, and use a facial mask, too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>A facial mask? Now that you mention it, I don’t have that at home right now…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Well then, why don’t we go and buy you some? You know, the new one that just came out smells soooo nice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh, that sounds good. Let’s go right away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
